LanguageData.JRWNyctosaurusReconstruct.label: Nyctosaurus
LanguageData.JRWNyctosaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03722-1876 [NYCTOSAURUS GRACILIS] CODENAME: PERCH >8492
A strange pterosaur with an even stranger crest. It is uncertain as to whether or not the crest had membrane between the branches.
